snippet: High-ranking Oakland police officers are not being held accountable for crimes committed in the areas they oversee, a report by a former Los Angeles police chief found.
abstract: Report by consulting group finds that high-ranking Oakland police officers are not being held accountable for crimes committed in areas they oversee.
lead_paragraph: High-ranking Oakland police officers are not being held accountable for crimes committed in the areas they oversee, a report by a former Los Angeles police chief found.

headline.main: California: Study of Police Finds Lack of Accountability
headline.print_headline: California: Study of Police Finds Lack of Accountability
